welcome_message_body: Welcome to Amroha, a city known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and exquisite handicrafts. We invite you to explore our charming streets, indulge in our delicious cuisine, and immerse yourself in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Chicken king
restaurants.description: Chicken king is a mughlai restaurant located in Amroha.
restaurants.address: Kanth Road (Bypass Amroha), Amroha 244221, Uttar Pradesh
